name: PackageAzureDevOpsExtension
description: Package an Azure DevOps extension into a VSIX file
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: rootFolder
inputs.label: Root manifests folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Root folder from which the manifests are searched.

inputs.name: patternManifest
inputs.label: Manifest file(s)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the pattern for manifest files. One file per line.

inputs.name: outputPath
inputs.label: Package output file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the path and file name of the generated vsix.

inputs.name: outputVariable
inputs.label: Output Variable (deprecated)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The variable name to assign the location of the generated package to. Specify only the name, e.g.: `Extension.OutputPath`, not `$(Extension.OutputPath)`.

inputs.name: publisherId
inputs.label: Publisher ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Extension publisher ID. If not specified, the publisher specified in the manifest will be used.

inputs.name: extensionId
inputs.label: Extension ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Overrides extension ID. If not specified, the extension ID specified in the manifest will be used

inputs.name: extensionTag
inputs.label: Extension Tag
inputs.helpMarkDown: Extension Tag to append to the extension ID

inputs.name: extensionName
inputs.label: Extension name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Overrides extension name. If not specified, the extension name specified in the manifest will be used

inputs.name: extensionVersion
inputs.label: Extension version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Overrides extension version. If not specified, the extension version specified in the manifest will be used

inputs.name: updateTasksVersion
inputs.label: Override tasks version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Search for contributed tasks in extension manifests and updates the version specified in each Build and Release task found.

inputs.name: updateTasksVersionType
inputs.label: Override Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Task version replacement format. You can select which part(s) of the version number to update (Major (x.y.r), Minor (1.y.r), or Patch (1.0.r)). The value (x.y.r) is taken from the Extension Version input or the extension manifest.

inputs.name: updateTasksId
inputs.label: Override task id
inputs.helpMarkDown: Search for contributed tasks in extension manifests and updates the id specified in each Build and Release task found based on the Publisher, ExtensionId and TaskName.

inputs.name: extensionVisibility
inputs.label: Extension visibility
inputs.helpMarkDown: Overrides extension visibility (Public vs Private) and optionally adds the Preview flag. If not specified, the extension visibility specified in the manifest will be used

inputs.name: extensionPricing
inputs.label: Extension pricing
inputs.helpMarkDown: Overrides extension pricing (Free vs Paid). If not specified, the extension pricing specified in the manifest will be used

inputs.name: cwd
inputs.label: Working Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Current working directory when tfx is run. Defaults to the folder where the manifest is located.

outputVariables.name: Extension.OutputPath
outputVariables.description: Is set with the generated vsix path.
